name: The Crypt (abso1ution)
description:
You awake within a sealed crypt, filled with strange symbols and mysterious objects... only your wits and ingenuity can help you escape.

The Crypt is a free, short cryptography game inspired from cryptography puzzles frequent in ARG's and flash escape rooms such as Crimson Room by Toshimitsu Takagi.

Stuck? There are hints on the Discord server or discuss with other players. The first five to escape without hints will also receive prizes.

An understanding of some basic cryptography is recommended but not necessarily needed with outside research. This guide is recommended for players new to cryptography.

Please share with friends if you enjoy and any donations are highly appreciated.
